CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 7, 1956, page A20, reads: "Foster B. Hartman, sales manager, poses with Miss Helen Currier sales trainer, in the Stauffer Home Reducing Plan booth."
TitMainTitle: Foster B. Hartman, sales manager, and Helen Currier, sales trainer, standing at the Stauffer Home Reducing Plan exercise program booth, in Syria Mosque for the 1956 Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair
CatSubject_tab: Trade shows--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Men--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Women--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Currier, Helen.Hartman, Foster B.Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair.Syria Mosque (Pittsburgh, Pa.)
